song.title: Slomo
song.lyrics:
21 ContributorsTranslationsPolskiEspañolSlomo Lyrics[Instrumental Intro]

[Chorus]
You give me your love, it's a curious love
You give me your heart, it's a curious thing
Our lady of the shipwreck is running through the storm
With her skirts blown back
Hands to the fore

[Post-Chorus]
My love and I go, it's a curious woe
Like dreamers at dawn, awake but not yet
You gimme your heart, it's a curious thing
Gimme your love, it's a curious love

It's a curious ride (Gimme your heart)

We're younger than clouds
Younger than clouds
(Younger than clouds)
(Younger than clouds)
(Younger than clouds)
(Younger than clouds)
(Younger than clouds)
(Younger than clouds)

song.title: Everyone Knows
song.lyrics:

But you're all alone
I see you there
But I don’t know anything
And you holding back
Just holding on
You say you're fine
Going to America

[Chorus]

You can sail away
Can rent a car
Take me to the place you know

[Refrain]
Take me to America, America

[Bridge]
To the great north
To the great north

[Verse 2]
Well it sounds like fun
But I don’t know anyone
Just say the word
Take me to America
I can let you go
We can take it slow
Just pack your bag
Take me to the place you know

song.lyrics:
24 ContributorsTranslationsPolskiEspañolNo Longer Making Time Lyrics[Verse 1]
You come anyway
You say you're clean and you like it that way
You got a new boy
He keeps it light, yeah, you like a light love
Who cares anyway
Oh Lord, I remember those days
And all those nights
When you wanted so much more

[Chorus]
Cathy, don't wait too long
We're no longer making time
Forever we'll be
Together, we breathe
No longer far to run

[Verse 2]
Come anyway
Come on down in your blue-eyed way
Comes and it goes
You come around and I don't know why
Just lovers and life
Common ground, yeah, there's no surprise
Just holding your arms
Holding on till the fear, it goes

song.title: 30th June
song.lyrics:

With these eyes I saw the best in life
The most sensical day I had
Turning stones, turning stones over til they shone

(Dark as days, dark as days)

And you were caught in the dark
With nothing makes sense
But you were caught in the dark
Where nothing makes no sense

(Shadows down, shadows down / when I saw the light in you)

The most beautiful day I ever, ever had
With these eyes I saw the light in yours
The most sensical day I had
Turning stones, turning stones over til they shone
